subject: Real Estate
title: Nuisance Law and Neighbors
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Nuisance Law and Neighbors.

hook.text: Your neighbor runs a machine shop in his garage until midnight. The noise shakes your walls.

buildup.text: Nuisance law protects property owners from unreasonable interference with the use of their land.

discovery.text: A 'private nuisance' affects specific neighbors. A 'public nuisance' affects the community at large.

twist.text: Nuisance claims require balancing â€” the court weighs the harm to you against the value of the activity.

climax.text: If the nuisance is severe enough, courts can issue injunctions ordering the neighbor to stop permanently.

punchline.text: Your right to use your land ends where your neighbor's begins.
